::Ramulus/Striker::

Ramulus lowers his gun, still ready to raise it if neccessary.

"Or," he says, "You can give us the mouse and we will let you go unharmed."

"You should really listen to him," Striker says, limping up behind 
Transantulus and dragging Ramhorn with him, gun aimed at Transantulus, "You 
are not in a good position. Cooperation would be wise of you."
